channel.title: RSC Accounts
channel.description:
I know they are worth alot, but i would like it if someone would tell me just how much one is worth about? And I believe the fact that it has a scythe on RS2 makes it a tiny more valuable if I'm not mistaken? So how much if I was to sell one, would it go for?
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img230.imageshack.us/img230/4927/accountforsaledl3.png[/img][/URL]
Not the best stats but liek I said it has a scythe and its still workable for those who don't wanna start from scratch and its woodcuttinf is above 80 so its pretty good for money making. So now what do you guys think its worth seeing its rough stats and all?

item.title: RSC Accounts
item.dc:creator: @footballplayar34 footballplayar34
item.description:
@footballplayar34 wrote:

[quote=“leader, post:7, topic:41902”][quote author=footballplayar34 link=topic=58580.msg716498#msg716498 date=1167619776]

Lol, he is talking shit. They wont reach more than 3 million RS2? Heck, I gave mine away for free yesterday.

i saw one on ebay a few months ago for $200 thats why
[/quote]

Most of the people who sell Runescape accounts on eBay are scammers. If you have noticed, there are plenty of accounts that go over $500. If you look who is bidding on them, you will notice that people with negative or 0 feedback are bidding on them. They have no intention of paying, but just bid on the accounts, because they feel like it. Also Jagex monitors eBay and will attempt to stop the auction before it completes, and your runescape account will result in a permanent ban if they find out what the name of it is.

I do not recommend selling/buying runescape accounts off of eBay. You will lose out. Believe me, I know…[/quote]

i know most are scammers which is why i dont sell my account on there i am thinking about selling a few account at talk geek

Read full topic

item.title: RSC Accounts
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

Also, to get some real money for it, people would much prefer the stats to all be 1 xD

Lol, he is talking shit. They wont reach more than 3 million RS2? Heck, I gave mine away for free yesterday.

i saw one on ebay a few months ago for $200 thats why[/quote]

Most of the people who sell Runescape accounts on eBay are scammers. If you have noticed, there are plenty of accounts that go over $500. If you look who is bidding on them, you will notice that people with negative or 0 feedback are bidding on them. They have no intention of paying, but just bid on the accounts, because they feel like it. Also Jagex monitors eBay and will attempt to stop the auction before it completes, and your runescape account will result in a permanent ban if they find out what the name of it is.

I do not recommend selling/buying runescape accounts off of eBay. You will lose out. Believe me, I know…
